predicate_def: apply paint to; coat with paint
caption: clock is painted green
roles_example:
<example name="intransitive verse">
<inflection aspect="ns" form="full" person="ns" tense="present" voice="active" /><text>
      With lipsticks, liners, lotions and creams,/
      There are still beauty plans left to tackle:/
      But as the years go by, it seems/
      That before I paint, I should spackle.
</text>
        <arg n="0">I</arg>
        <rel>paint</rel>
</example>
